column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Went here for the first time for a birthday party. This place was decent. I liked my food
column3: but it didn't blow me away. We got a few pitchers of Sangria
column5: but not great. Â I tried the spinach and manchengo stuffed mushrooms
column7: goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column8: and the garlic potato salad and they were all good.
